scripts.decrypt: node pkg/vuepress-plugin-simple-encrypt/cli.js decrypt --source-dir docs --key-file docs/temp/keys.json --temp docs/.temp-encrypt --on-new-key ask
scripts.encrypt: node pkg/vuepress-plugin-simple-encrypt/cli.js encrypt --source-dir docs --key-file docs/temp/keys.json --temp docs/.temp-encrypt --on-new-key ask
scripts.d: node pkg/vuepress-plugin-simple-encrypt/cli.js decrypt --source-dir docs --key-file docs/temp/keys.json --temp docs/.temp-encrypt --on-new-key ask
scripts.e: node pkg/vuepress-plugin-simple-encrypt/cli.js encrypt --source-dir docs --key-file docs/temp/keys.json --temp docs/.temp-encrypt --on-new-key ask
scripts.publish: cd ./vdoing && npm publish && cd .. && yarn updateTheme
scripts.updateTheme: yarn remove vuepress-theme-vdoing && rm -rf node_modules && yarn && yarn add vuepress-theme-vdoing -D
